statements: SELECT * FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, temperature FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE processing_stage = 'Stage 1';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE time_duration > 60;
SELECT product_name, check_result FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE temperature < 25.00;
SELECT processing_stage, time_duration FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE check_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlRecords ORDER BY record_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, processing_stage, temperature FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE temperature > 50;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(time_duration) FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE check_result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE processing_stage = 'Packaging' AND temperature < 40;
SELECT product_name, processing_stage, check_result FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE check_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY processing_stage, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM biotech_food_processing_stages;
SELECT product_name, process_description FROM biotech_food_processing_stages;
SELECT stage_id, product_name, quality_checks FROM biotech_food_processing_stages ORDER BY stage_id DESC;
SELECT stage_id, process_description, quality_checks FROM biotech_food_processing_stages WHERE product_name = 'Organic Yogurt';
SELECT * FROM product_safety_records WHERE passing_grade = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM product_safety_records WHERE passing_grade = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, process_description FROM biotech_food_processing_stages WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(product_name) > 10;
SELECT inspector_name, check_date FROM product_safety_records WHERE passing_grade = FALSE ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, process_description, quality_checks FROM biotech_food_processing_stages WHERE stage_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT stage_id, product_name, process_description, inspector_name FROM biotech_food_processing_stages LEFT JOIN product_safety_records ON biotech_food_processing_stages.stage_id = product_safety_records.stage_id WHERE passing_grade = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT stage_name, date_time FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspector_name, result FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT stage_name, description FROM ProcessingStages ORDER BY stage_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, safety_rating FROM ProductSafety WHERE stage_id = 2;
SELECT record_id, stage_name, date_time FROM QualityControlRecords ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT stage_name, inspector_name, result FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspector_name
SELECT pc.stage_name, pc.description, ps.safety_rating FROM ProcessingStages pc INNER JOIN ProductSafety ps ON pc.stage_id = ps.stage_id WHERE ps.safety_rating = 'High'
SELECT record_id, stage_name, inspector_name, result FROM QualityControlRecords WHERE result = 'Fail' AND inspector_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT qs.safety_rating, pc.stage_name FROM ProductSafety qs LEFT JOIN ProcessingStages pc ON qs.stage_id = pc.stage_id ORDER BY qs.safety_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM quality_control_records;
SELECT stage_name, date_processed FROM quality_control_records WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, ingredients, allergens FROM food_products WHERE allergens LIKE '%peanuts%';
SELECT * FROM product_safety WHERE has_passed = false;
SELECT product_name, process_duration FROM food_products JOIN processing_stages ON food_products.product_id = processing_stages.stage_id;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_records WHERE quality_rating > 7;
SELECT product_name, allergens FROM food_products WHERE allergens LIKE '%peanuts%';
SELECT stage_name, process_duration FROM processing_stages ORDER BY process_duration DESC;
SELECT product_name, ingredients FROM food_products WHERE ingredients LIKE '%sugar%' OR ingredients LIKE '%salt%';
SELECT product_id, stage_name, has_passed FROM product_safety WHERE has_passed = TRUE AND remarks IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_records;
SELECT product_name, test_type FROM quality_control_records WHERE test_type = 'Chemical Test';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_records ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, supervisor FROM department_records WHERE location = 'Head Office';
SELECT stage_name, description FROM processing_stages WHERE stage_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_records;
SELECT product_name, test_type, test_result FROM quality_control_records WHERE stage_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_safety WHERE safety_rating = 'High' ORDER BY safety_tested_on DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employee_records WHERE department = 'Quality Assurance' OR department = 'Production' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM processing_stages WHERE stage_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND description LIKE '%quality%'
